request.description:
Gets all the Gallery objects from GalleryGuide

Example response:

``` json
{
    "size": 1
    "next": "galleryguide.me/api/galleries?page=2"
    "galleries": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "artwork_ids":[
                1
            ],
            "artist_ids":[
                1
            ]
            "num_artworks": 1,
            "num_artists": 1,
            "name": "Art Institute of Chicago",
            "location": "Chicago, USA",
            "description": "The Art Institute of Chicago is the second largest art museum in the USA housing a world-renowned encyclopedic collection.",
            "thumbnail": "https://d32dm0rphc51dk.cloudfront.net/10igV4wzNgS2Vwm7uYxxmg/square.jpg"
            "website": "http://www.artic.edu/",
        }
    ]
}

```

Gets the specific gallery object associated with the provided id.

Example response:

``` json
{
        "id": 1,
        "num_artworks": 1,
        "num_artists": 1,
        "name": "Art Institute of Chicago",
        "region": "North America",
        "description": "The Art Institute of Chicago is the second largest art museum in the USA housing a world-renowned encyclopedic collection.",
        "thumbnail": "https://d32dm0rphc51dk.cloudfront.net/10igV4wzNgS2Vwm7uYxxmg/square.jpg"
        "website": "http://www.artic.edu/",
}

```

Gets all the Artist objects from GalleryGuide

Example response:

``` json
{
    "size": 1
    "next": "galleryguide.me/api/artists?page=2"
    "artists": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "artwork_ids":[
                1
            ],
            "gallery_ids":[
                1
            ],
            "num_artworks": 1,
            "num_galleries": 1,
            "name": "Grant Wood",
            "biography": "Grant Wood is known for his stylized and subtly humorous scenes of rural people, Iowa cornfields, and mythic subjects from American history—such as the Art Institute’s iconic...",
            "birth_year": 1891,
            "death_year": 1942,
            "thumbnail": "Grant Wood.png"
        }
    ]
}

```

Gets the specific artist object associated with the provided id.

Example response:

``` json
{
    "id": 1,
    "num_artworks": 1,
    "num_galleries": 1,
    "name": "Grant Wood",
    "biography": "Grant Wood is known for his stylized and subtly humorous scenes of rural people, Iowa cornfields, and mythic subjects from American history—such as the Art Institute’s iconic...",
    "birth_year": 1891,
    "death_year": 1942,
    "thumbnail": "Grant Wood.png"
}

```

Gets all the Artwork objects from GalleryGuide

Example response:

``` json
{
    "size": 1
    "next": "galleryguide.me/api/artworks?page=2"
    "artworks": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "artist_id": 1,
            "gallery_id": 1,
            "artist_name": "Grant Wood",
            "image": "American Gothic.jpg",
            "thumbnail": "American Gothic.jpg",
            "title": "American Gothic",
            "date": "1850",
            "medium": "Oil on Beaver Board",
            "iconicity": 130.5,
            "copyright": "Creative Commons",
        }
    ]
}

```

Gets the specific artwork object associated with the provided id.

Example response:

``` json
{
    "id": 1,
    "artist_id": 1,
    "gallery_id": 1,
    "artist_name": "Grant Wood",
    "image": "American Gothic.jpg",
    "thumbnail": "American Gothic.jpg",
    "title": "American Gothic",
    "date": "1850",
    "medium": "Oil on Beaver Board",
    "iconicity": 130.5,
    "copyright": "Creative Commons",
}

```

Gets a psuedo-randomly selected artwork and artist pair.

``` json
{
    "artist": {
        "id": 1,
        "num_artworks": 1,
        "num_galleries": 1,
        "name": "Grant Wood",
        "biography": "Grant Wood is known for his stylized and subtly humorous scenes of rural people, Iowa cornfields, and mythic subjects from American history—such as the Art Institute’s iconic...",
        "birth_year": 1891,
        "death_year": 1942,
        "thumbnail": "Grant Wood.png"
    },
    "artwork":{
        "id": 1,
        "artist_id": 1,
        "gallery_id": 1,
        "artist_name": "Grant Wood",
        "image": "American Gothic.jpg",
        "thumbnail": "American Gothic.jpg",
        "title": "American Gothic",
        "date": "1850",
        "medium": "Oil on Beaver Board",
        "iconicity": 130.5,
        "copyright": "Creative Commons",
    }
}

```
